name: Layla Ahmed
about: Marketing Manager with experience in business development, client relations, and market analysis.

experiences.description: Identifying and analyzing new business opportunities and developing customized growth strategies. Building and managing strong relationships with key clients and strategic partners. Conducting market studies to identify trends and competitive opportunities.

Leading R&D operations to explore new markets and launch new products and services. Managing business development team and guiding them to achieve set goals. Analyzing market and sales data to identify improvement opportunities and expand customer base.

items: Market data and campaign performance analysis
